statements: SELECT * FROM TrafficData ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT city, traffic_volume FROM TrafficData WHERE weather_condition = 'Rainy'
SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE city = 'New York' AND road_condition = 'Wet'
SELECT date, city, traffic_volume FROM TrafficData WHERE traffic_volume > 1000
SELECT city, traffic_volume, weather_condition FROM TrafficData ORDER BY traffic_volume DESC
SELECT city, traffic_volume FROM TrafficData WHERE traffic_volume > 1000 ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND road_condition = 'Wet' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT city, weather_condition FROM TrafficData WHERE weather_condition = 'Rainy' AND road_condition = 'Wet' ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT city, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM TrafficData GROUP BY city HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT city, AVG(traffic_volume) AS avg_traffic_volume FROM TrafficData GROUP BY city HAVING AVG(traffic_volume) > 5000 ORDER BY avg_traffic_volume DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_traffic_data;
SELECT traffic_volume, traffic_speed FROM historical_traffic_data;
SELECT * FROM historical_traffic_data WHERE traffic_volume > 1000;
SELECT * FROM infrastructure_upgrades ORDER BY upgrade_cost DESC;
SELECT upgrade_date, upgrade_description FROM infrastructure_upgrades;
SELECT * FROM historical_traffic_data
SELECT date, traffic_volume, traffic_speed FROM historical_traffic_data
SELECT traffic_volume, MAX(traffic_speed) FROM historical_traffic_data GROUP BY traffic_volume
SELECT * FROM infrastructure_upgrades ORDER BY upgrade_cost DESC
SELECT SUM(traffic_volume) AS total_traffic_volume, AVG(traffic_speed) AS average_traffic_speed FROM historical_traffic_data
SELECT * FROM historical_traffic_data WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT traffic_volume, timestamp FROM historical_traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM traffic_patterns WHERE pattern_id = 2
SELECT * FROM infrastructure_upgrades WHERE upgrade_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY upgrade_date ASC
SELECT upgrade_type, COUNT(*) FROM infrastructure_upgrades GROUP BY upgrade_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM historical_traffic_data WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, AVG(traffic_volume) AS avg_volume FROM historical_traffic_data GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns WHERE pattern_name LIKE '%highway%' ORDER BY pattern_id ASC;
SELECT upgrade_type, COUNT(*) AS total_upgrades FROM infrastructure_upgrades GROUP BY upgrade_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM traffic_patterns WHERE pattern_id IN (SELECT pattern_id FROM historical_traffic_data WHERE location = 'Los Angeles');
SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT location, traffic_volume FROM TrafficData ORDER BY traffic_volume DESC
SELECT date, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 30
SELECT infrastructure_type, upgrade_cost FROM Infrastructure WHERE upgrade_cost < 5000
SELECT * FROM PredictionData WHERE date = '2023-10-15'
SELECT * FROM TrafficData WHERE location = 'Highway 101' ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC
SELECT date, time, traffic_volume FROM TrafficData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND location = 'City Center' ORDER BY traffic_volume DESC
SELECT AVG(temperature) as avg_temp, AVG(precipitation) as avg_precip FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 20 AND precipitation < 0.1
SELECT * FROM Infrastructure WHERE upgrade_cost > 50000 ORDER BY upgrade_cost DESC, infrastructure_type
SELECT date, traffic_prediction FROM PredictionData WHERE traffic_prediction > 1000 AND upgrade_recommendation = 'Recommended' ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT * FROM historical_data;
SELECT id, date, weather_condition FROM historical_data WHERE traffic_volume > 1000;
SELECT description, pattern_name, importance FROM traffic_patterns ORDER BY importance DESC;
SELECT id, trend_name FROM traffic_trends WHERE prediction_accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT update_date, cost, description FROM infrastructure_updates WHERE cost > 50000 ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT id, date, traffic_volume, weather_condition FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT pattern_name, description, importance FROM traffic_patterns WHERE importance > 2 ORDER BY importance ASC
SELECT date, predicted_volume, confidence_level FROM predicted_traffic WHERE date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31'
SELECT id, description, cost FROM infrastructure_updates WHERE cost > 10000 ORDER BY cost DESC
SELECT trend_name, prediction_accuracy, trend_description FROM traffic_trends
